info.summary:
John G. Breslin works as a Lecturer and Researcher in Insight Centre for Data Analytics, National University of Ireland, Galway, and his\her h-index is 35, g-index is 66. His\Her interests are :
 Semantic Web; Social Network; Social Web; Social Media; Ontologies;
